**Perception** +6; low-light vision, scent (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**

hoof +9,
**Damage** 1d6+5 bludgeoning

**Gallop** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The war horse Strides twice. It has a +10-foot circumstance bonus to its Speed during these Strides.
